about.title: About me
about.description: Currently enrolled at LiveCampus, I am seeking an apprenticeship to put into practice my skills in Front-end (AngularTS, HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap...), Back-end (C# .NET, Python, NodeJS...), Mobile Development (Swift, Kotlin), and databases, while continuing to learn and grow alongside a dynamic team.
about.qualities: Curious, rigorous, and motivated, I am ready to take on new technical challenges and contribute to meaningful projects that make an impact.
about.prime: Currently seeking an apprenticeship with a schedule of 1 week at school / 3 weeks in the company â€“ Eligible for a grant of up to â‚¬5,000.

fimuWeb.title: FIMU Project: Administrator Website
fimuWeb.description: Administrator website to manage the festival data

details.message1: List of artists with their information, filterable and easily editable to simplify the organizersâ€™ work.
details.message2: Access detailed information about an artist via the view button.
details.message3: Editing page to correct or update data, synchronized in real time with the mobile app.
details.message4: Clear visualization of the concert schedule, with the ability to view event details in one click.
details.message5: Automatic import of CSV files prepared by the organizers, ensuring continuity of their workflow and direct data updates in the mobile app.

fimuMobile.title: FIMU Project: Mobile Application
fimuMobile.description: iOS Mobile Application displaying festival data for visitors. Note that unlike the administrator website, no data modification will be possible in this app.

details.message1: Home page with color-coded announcements according to their importance and access to an interactive FAQ.
details.message2: Filterable list of artists by country, musical genre, and performance day, with color codes to identify genres.
details.message3: Detailed artist profile with social media and concert schedules.
details.message4: Interactive schedule with advanced filters (days, artists, genres) and a color code legend for easier reading.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Website developed in TypeScript with Angular and TailwindCSS showcasing the different academic projects I have successfully completed.
